it.apice.sapere.api.space.core
Interface LSAspaceCore<RDFStmtIterType>

Type Parameters:
RDFStmtIterType - The class that represents an iterator over RDF Statements
All Superinterfaces:
OntologyHandler
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractLSAspaceCoreImpl, LSAspaceImpl
public interface LSAspaceCore<RDFStmtIterType>
extends OntologyHandler

This inteface models a (local) LSA-space as seen by the system. It contains calls that should not be exposed to a SAPEREAgent.

This entity is intended to be:

  • Atomic
  • Passive
  • Mutable
  • Thread-safe

Author:
Paolo Contessi

LSAspaceCore<RDFStmtIterType> inject(CompiledLSA<RDFStmtIterType> lsa)
                                     throws SAPEREException

Inserts in the space a new LSA.

Parameters:
lsa - The LSA to be inserted
Returns:
The LSAspace itself for further operations
Throws:
SAPEREException - An LSA with the same LSA-id has already been inserted

                                  throws SAPEREException

Parameters:
lsaId - The LSA-id of the requested LSA
Returns:
The LSA the caller requested
Throws:
SAPEREException - The requested LSA does not exists in this LSA-space or parsing errors

                                     throws SAPEREException

Removes the LSA from the space.

Returns:
The LSAspace itself for further operations
Throws:

update

LSAspaceCore<RDFStmtIterType> update(CompiledLSA<RDFStmtIterType> lsa)
                                     throws SAPEREException

Updates the LSA in the space, which has the same LSA-id, with values from the provided one.

LSAId lsaId = getLSAId();
LSA lsa = read(lsaId);

LSA modLsa = modifyLSA(lsa);
assert modLsa.getLSAId().equals(lsaId);
s
update(modLsa);
assert modLsa.equals(read(lsaId));

Parameters:
lsa - The LSA to be removed
Returns:
The LSAspace itself for further operations
Throws:
SAPEREException - The LSA is not in the LSA-space

clear

LSAspaceCore<RDFStmtIterType> clear()

Removes all LSAs.

Returns:
The LSAspace itself for further operations

                    throws SAPEREException

Finds possible matches in the LSA-space for the provided Ecolaw.

Parameters:
law - The law to be checked
Returns:
Possible matches that has been found (empty list if no match)
Throws:
SAPEREException - Cannot complete match process

getCustomStrategyPipeline

CustomStrategyPipeline<RDFStmtIterType> getCustomStrategyPipeline()

Retrieves a reference to the internal strategy pipeline.

This pipeline should be used for extension purposes, in order to install custom components that manipulates LSA before executing primitives.

Returns:
The custom strategy pipeline

observe

LSAspaceCore<RDFStmtIterType> observe(LSAid lsaId,
                                      LSAObserver obs)
                                      throws SAPEREException

Starts observing the specified LSA.

Parameters:
lsaId - The LSA-id of the LSA to be observed
obs - The entity that will observe the LSA
Returns:
The LSAspace itself for further operations
Throws:
SAPEREException - Permission denied

ignore

LSAspaceCore<RDFStmtIterType> ignore(LSAid lsaId,
                                     LSAObserver obs)

Stop observing the specified LSA.

If obs isn't actually observing the LSA then the request is dropped silently.

Parameters:
lsaId - The id of the LSA to ignore
obs - The entity that is observing the LSA
Returns:
The LSAspace itself for further operations

beginRead

LSAspaceCore<RDFStmtIterType> beginRead()

Gets lock for READ procedures.

In order to release the lock call done().

Returns:
The LSA-space itself

beginWrite

LSAspaceCore<RDFStmtIterType> beginWrite()

Gets lock for WRITE procedures.

In order to release the lock call done().

Returns:
The LSA-space itself

done

void done()

Releases the acquired lock.
